Name: assign_team_to_project
Description: Whether a specific team is assigned to a project

Name: assign_worker_to_team
Description: Whether a worker is assigned to a team

Name: assign_user_story_to_sprint
Description: Whether a user story is scheduled in a sprint backlog

Name: select_feature_for_release
Description: Whether a feature is included in a release plan

Name: select_epic_for_backlog
Description: Whether an epic is included in the active product backlog

Name: allocate_task_effort_hours
Description: Effort assigned to a task in hours

Name: set_team_size
Description: Planned team size for a sprint

Name: set_story_points
Description: Story points assigned to a user story

Name: set_blocker_severity
Description: Severity level assigned to a blocker

Name: set_scrum_board_column_count
Description: Number of columns configured on the Scrum board

Name: schedule_daily_scrum_minutes
Description: Duration of the Daily Scrum in minutes

Name: approve_budget_per_project
Description: Approved budget amount for a project
